thread.section_title: Tomtop 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 Tomtop 的点评意见 | www.tomtop.com
thread.title: Anthony Witham
thread.title_full: Tomtop 的点评人 Anthony Witham

author: Anthony Witham
title: Anthony Witham
text: I took a gamble and ordered some Philip Sonicare replacement heads from this company as I had never used them before. The products arrived reasonably quickly, they are in China. Product was packed well and was original parts not copies. I have since bought other products from them and I am very happy to recommend this company.
